id.kaytrust.core.credential.ethereum.client

Interface EthereumCredentialValidation

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CredentialValidation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EthereumCredentialValidationImpl

    public interface EthereumCredentialValidation
extends CredentialValidation
    The generalized interface compliant with any ethereum network that allows any consumer to query about the validity of a credential.
    See Also:
    CredentialValidation

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static EthereumCredentialValidation instance(String hostRpc, String token, String contractAddressCredential, ProofTypeBuilder proofTypesBuilder)
      ProofType as an argument.

      • Methods inherited from interface id.kaytrust.core.credential.base.CredentialValidation

        loadProofType, verifyCredential

    • Method Detail

      • instance

        static EthereumCredentialValidation instance(String hostRpc,
                                             String token,
                                             String contractAddressCredential,
                                             ProofTypeBuilder proofTypesBuilder)
                                      throws ParamEmptyException
        ProofType as an argument.
        Parameters:
        hostRpc - Host and port where ethereum node serves RPC requests
        token - can be blank, is token field Authorization
        contractAddressCredential - Contract Address where the Smart contract lives.
        proofTypesBuilder - The proofType class contains the necessary methods to check if a verifiable credential is valid. EthereumAttestation2019BuilderEthereumAttestationRegistryIntermediateStatus2021Builder
        Returns:
        instance EthereumCredentialValidation
        Throws:
        ParamEmptyException - if a required parameter is empty.
